arm_group.description: Full-time faculty with morning and afternoon outpatient clinics on the same day  in SNUH

brief_summary.textblock:
The attention and clinical performance of physician might be decreased after outpatient
      clinic session compared to those measured before outpatient clinic.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Attention of Physician After Outpatient Clinic

detailed_description.textblock:
A large body of data shows that fatigue impairs human performance. Additionally, many
      studies have provided evidence that fatigue can worsen mood, as indicated by increased
      scores on measures of depression, anxiety, confusion, and anger. In this context, we
      examined attentional and emotional changes in physicians after they completed an
      overwhelming outpatient clinic in a university-affiliated tertiary referral hospital in
      South Korea.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  physicians with outpatient clinic sessions in Seoul National University Hospital

          -  age 30~59

          -  internal part or external part

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  physicians who do not agree to participate in the study

          -  physicians who are taking drugs known to affect the sleep/wake cycle or daytime
             alertness

          -  physicians who have current psychiatric illness or sleep disorder

study_pop.textblock: physicians with outpatient clinic sessions in Seoul National University Hospital

clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Performance, Attention, and Emotion of Physician Before and After Outpatient Clinic Session

oversight_info.authority: South Korea: Korea Food and Drug Administration (KFDA)

primary_outcome.measure: difference of response time in PVT(Psychomotor vigilance task) before and after outpatient clinic session
primary_outcome.time_frame: change from baseline in response time in PVT after opd session (average 7hours)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: frequency of physician's clinical mistakes during morning and afternoon session in outpatient clinic
secondary_outcome.time_frame: for the duration of opd session, average up to 7hours

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Cross-Sectional
